intro: The fan-favorite arcade classic—The Crane Game—returns, powered up! Packed with more content and fresh new controls! Become a Crane Master!
description:
Play the evolved Crane Game experience on the Nintendo Switch™!
Share Joy-Con™ to face off against friends in 1-on-1 battles!
Scoop, drop, push!

[Score Attack]
Scoop up tons of prizes and earn a high spot on the leaderboards!
Aim for a Jackpot, and something amazing might happen!

[Battle]
Intense 1-on-1 showdowns await! Test your skills against CPUs and friends!
Take on Crane Game masters from around the world in Online Battles!

[Collection]
Admire the prizes you've collected!
Can you collect all 280+ prizes and complete your collection?
